title: Investigate and enhance tlog prime to make priority levels clearer to agents
description: Review the current tlog prime output and improve how priority levels are communicated to AI agents. Consider: clearer labels, visual indicators, or better ordering/grouping by priority.

title: Add sync hint to tlog prime
description: Add a hint suggesting agents use 'tlog sync -m <message>' periodically to commit tlog state.

title: Add --for flag hint to prime tips
description: The --for flag creates a subtask with a dependency on the parent, enabling task decomposition. Add a tip to prime explaining this.

title: Verify partial ID matching and add hint to prime
description: Check if tlog supports partial ID matching (e.g., 'tlog done 652c' instead of full 8-char ID). If supported, add a hint to prime tips.

title: Add canonical labels with hints in prime output
description: Define canonical labels (spike, needs-breakdown, blocked-external, wip) with documented semantics in prime tips. Add advisory hints when tasks might benefit from labels they don't have (e.g., large tasks without subtasks lacking spike/needs-breakdown).

notes: Removed hints logic per feedback - labels are conventions, not enforcement

title: review and update README.md and CLAUDE.md, if needed to reflect current state
make tlog sync require message as positional argument
description: Remove the -m flag from sync command. Message should be a required positional argument instead: tlog sync "message" instead of tlog sync -m "message"
